name: Combun
description:
One-day project where i wanted to figure out how to make combos. I couldn't get the timing exactly right so i made it into a whole game so YOU could try. Hit the punching bags and see how many times you can land the three hit combo.

Below you can download the .gb rom or .pocket file for your Analogue Pocket.

CONTROLS

  • Directions = Arrows or WASD
  • A = Z or J (jump)
  • B = X or K (action)
  • Start = Return (pause)

KNOWN BUGS

  • THE COMBO! yeah i mean its kinda broken but thats kinda the game, right?
  • Uh... be careful with the camera. The camera offset breaks if you tap left and right a lot real fast. You'll know it because the game will totally slow to a crawl.
  • Probably some more. Let me know in the comments! But also tell me if the game is cool (it is 😎)
